system.description:
Benefit

The character can fire any personal firearm without penalty and may use the attack bonuses a firearm receives from upgrades.

Normal

Characters without this feat take a −4 penalty on attack rolls made with personal firearms,may not reload firearms, and may not use attack bonuses given by firearm upgrades.

Special

The character with this feat can use black powder firearms without penalty, but cannot reload them.

Tutoring

Time: 1 day

Benefit: Can reload firearms and attack penalty is reduced to −3. Considered proficient at using firearms for the purpose of feat prerequisites, but not for having the actual feat.
system.summary: Use and reload firearms without penalty, benefit from upgrades
